name: Bored At The Cricket
description:
Note: This game is only played with the 'SPACE' key

Bored At The Cricket is a 'Whale In Gumboots' production made at the 2017 Global Game Jam in Melbourne. It is an endless platformer that uses only the one button, 'SPACE'.

Play as a rogue beach ball that must try and get as far as possible across the crowd whilst avoiding security guards and empty seats.

Created By:

Phong Nguyen, Kerry Palmer, Geordie Hawkins, Abby Synth

Have fun and enjoy! Please feel free to leave a comment!
